meanings: wait, hold on, (informal) hang on; (예정된 일·사람 등을) expect, (formal) await; (고대하다) look forward to
hold a ball-point pen tightly in anticipation of an important announcement

meanings.meaning: Cekani Na Tmu, Cekani Na Svetlo

vlive.korean: [MC의 중간 평가를 기다리며 역할 체인지] 멤버 체인지! [While waiting for the interim checkup] Members, change! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.103
vlive.english: [While waiting for the interim checkup] Members, change!

vlive.korean: [경건한 마음으로 음식을 기다리며...] [Waiting for the food with a reverent mind...] View video 심포유 - my SMTelevision : [심포유 #첸] EP17 #대나무숲을달리다 #취향저격 #태세전환갑
vlive.english: [Waiting for the food with a reverent mind...]

vlive.korean: [랍스터 기다리며 설레는 마음으로 찰칵] 하나, 둘, 셋! [Waiting for the lobster] 1, 2, 3! 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) TOURLOG EP.21
[족발 기다리며 댓글 읽는 투안즈] 스포! [Yugyeom and Mark wait pig feet] Spoiler! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [GOT7] 됐고! 투안즈 이거나 머거^^💚(Mark and Yugyeom’s V in their dorm)
vlive.english: [Yugyeom and Mark wait pig feet] Spoiler!

vlive.korean: [그녀를 기다리며 몇 번이고 머릿속으로 연습했는데...] [Went through it over and over again in my head while waiting but...] View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 네가 좋으면 나도 좋아ㅣ[리얼하이로맨스(Real Highschool Romance)] EP 16
vlive.english: [Went through it over and over again in my head while waiting but...]

examples.korean: They giggled nervously as they waited for their turn. 발음듣기 그들은 자기들 차례를 기다리며 초조한 듯 피식피식 웃었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They giggled nervously as they waited for their turn. 발음

examples.korean: I spent a tense few weeks waiting for the results of the tests. 발음듣기 나는 그 테스트 결과를 기다리며 긴장된 몇 주를 보냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I spent a tense few weeks waiting for the results of the tests. 발음

examples.korean: Students stood around in groups waiting for their results. 발음듣기 학생들이 결과를 기다리며 끼리끼리 모여 서 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Students stood around in groups waiting for their results. 발음

examples.korean: She stationed herself at the window to await his return. 발음듣기 그녀는 그가 돌아오기를 기다리며 창가에 서[앉아] 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She stationed herself at the window to await his return. 발음

examples.korean: It’s been a nail-biting couple of weeks waiting for my results. 발음듣기 내 결과를 기다리며 초조하게 보낸 2주간이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s been a nail-biting couple of weeks waiting for my results. 발음
